title: Ice Cream Fever: Cooking Game
description: Ice Cream Fever: Cooking Game is a casual simulation game in which you play as a restaurant owner. Serve customers with many variations of food and beverages. Decorate your restaurant to attract more customers. Upgrade kitchen items, cook fast, and try to serve your customers efficiently. Use boosters to get more benefits like no burn, easy preparation, and auto-serve to customers. Make customers happy and be the best chef!
